      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Double value)
        Description copied from interface: Format
        Formats a value as a string.

        The formatted string this returns should will in an equal object when calling fromString(String).

        Formally: 

        value.equals(this.fromString(this.toString(value) == true
        Specified by:
        toString in interface Format<java.lang.Double>
